we're responsible for everything related
to

over the years

i found it very intriguing that it was a
conference that was focused on
practitioners and
it has become i think i've attended many
you know dozens of different conferences
throughout my career and one of the

implement you know often you go to a
conference and it's very theoretical and
it's like well that's interesting how am
i going to use that but every single

um from there i you know as an attendee

dio
it is my favorite conference it is my

that's amazing and

for a
from qcon plus november a topic

around
trust we're putting together a track
that talks about
how it's important for users to be able
to trust the systems that they're

i think that's a very timely topic
the other timely topic is how do we work

we've all been working most of us have

covid
